docTitle.titlePart:
A phase I, pharmacokinetic (PK) and preliminary efficacy assessment of ALD518, a humanized anti-IL-6 antibody, in
patients with advanced cancer.

byline.docAuthor: S Clarke 1 , C. Gebbie 1 , C Sweeney 2 , N Olszewksi 2 , J Smith 3

byline.affiliation: 2 University of Adelaide, Royal Adelaide Hospital,
